content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":80941,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王は封印できない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Demon King cannot be sealed.\""},{"lineNumber":80942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういうことだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's how it is.\""},{"lineNumber":80943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな……せっかくここまで来たのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way... we came all this way...\""},{"lineNumber":80944,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いつ頃、出てくる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Around when will he appear?\""},{"lineNumber":80945,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう遠くない先。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not too far from now."},{"lineNumber":80946,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今はそれしか分からんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's all I know at the moment.\""},{"lineNumber":80947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch...\""},{"lineNumber":80948,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのとき、ランス達に声がかけられた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, someone called out to Rance and the others."},{"lineNumber":80949,"originalJapaneseLine":"「み、皆さん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ev-e-eryone!\""},{"lineNumber":80950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ！？　アールコートちゃん！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!? Arcourt-chan!?\""},{"lineNumber":80951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……よ、良かった……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... th-thank goodness..."},{"lineNumber":80952,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ようやく……皆さんに会えました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"At last... I could meet everyone...\""},{"lineNumber":80953,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場に現れたのは、司令部にいる筈の","translatedEnglishLine":"The ones who appeared there were those who should have been at the headquarters,"},{"lineNumber":80954,"originalJapaneseLine":"アールコート、そして数十人の兵士達だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arcourt, and several dozen soldiers."},{"lineNumber":80955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何故ここに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why are you here...?\""},{"lineNumber":80956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まさか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way...\""},{"lineNumber":80957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":80958,"originalJapaneseLine":"「織田城が……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oda Castle has..."},{"lineNumber":80959,"originalJapaneseLine":"　陥落しました」","translatedEnglishLine":"fallen.\""},{"lineNumber":80960,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":80961,"originalJapaneseLine":"「申し訳ありません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sorry..."},{"lineNumber":80962,"originalJapaneseLine":"　守り切れず……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We couldn't protect it...\""},{"lineNumber":80963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達もJAPANから脱出。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We also escaped from JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":80964,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統達を追ってここまで……","translatedEnglishLine":"We followed the supreme commanders all the way here..."},{"lineNumber":80965,"originalJapaneseLine":"　数百人はいた兵も今はこれだけしか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"There were hundreds of soldiers, but now only this many remain...\""},{"lineNumber":80966,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No..."},{"lineNumber":80967,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今まで、よく保たせて下さいました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You held on well until now...\""},{"lineNumber":80968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「JAPANは魔軍に占領。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"JAPAN has been occupied by the Demon Army."},{"lineNumber":80969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また大陸の各国も占領され……","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, various countries on the continent have been occupied..."},{"lineNumber":80970,"originalJapaneseLine":"　安全な場所はなくなりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no safe place left.\""},{"lineNumber":80971,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ……そか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... I see.\""},{"lineNumber":80972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ところで、ウルザちゃんとクリームちゃんは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By the way, where are Urza-chan and Cream-chan?\""},{"lineNumber":80973,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこにいった？」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":80974,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":80975,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お二人は途中、強襲してきた魔軍との戦闘で、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The two of them, during the battle with the attacking Demon Army,"},{"lineNumber":80976,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……亡くなりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"...have died.\""},{"lineNumber":80977,"originalJapaneseLine":"これまで何があったのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Regarding what has happened until now,"},{"lineNumber":80978,"originalJapaneseLine":"アールコートの瞳は今までの周りの顔色を窺う、","translatedEnglishLine":"Arcourt's eyes, which had been watching others' expressions,"},{"lineNumber":80979,"originalJapaneseLine":"弱気な色は消え去っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"had lost their timid look."},{"lineNumber":80980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":80981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、そっか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I see.\""},{"lineNumber":80982,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, um... Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":80983,"originalJapaneseLine":"顔色を窺うように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Like trying to gauge his expression,"},{"lineNumber":80984,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルがランスを上目遣いで見上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sil looked up at Rance with an upward glance."},{"lineNumber":80985,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":80986,"originalJapaneseLine":"意外にもその表情に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Surprisingly, on that face,"},{"lineNumber":80987,"originalJapaneseLine":"怒りや落胆の色はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"there was no sign of anger or disappointment."},{"lineNumber":80988,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーんもかんも、なくなっちまったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everything's gone, hasn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":80989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一時は世界の王にまでなったというのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though I was once the king of the world,"},{"lineNumber":80990,"originalJapaneseLine":"　随分スッキリしたもんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've never felt this relieved.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな……せっかくここまで来たのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way... we came all this way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はそれしか分からんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's all I know at the moment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、ランス達に声がかけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, someone called out to Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ！？　アールコートちゃん！？」
ようやく……皆さんに会えました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At last... I could meet everyone..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場に現れたのは、司令部にいる筈の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ones who appeared there were those who should have been at the headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アールコート、そして数十人の兵士達だった。
総統達を追ってここまで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We followed the supreme commanders all the way here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数百人はいた兵も今はこれだけしか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were hundreds of soldiers, but now only this many remain..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで、よく保たせて下さいました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You held on well until now..."
"JAPAN has been occupied by the Demon Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また大陸の各国も占領され……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, various countries on the continent have been occupied...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安全な場所はなくなりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no safe place left."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところで、ウルザちゃんとクリームちゃんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, where are Urza-chan and Cream-chan?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お二人は途中、強襲してきた魔軍との戦闘で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The two of them, during the battle with the attacking Demon Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまで何があったのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regarding what has happened until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アールコートの瞳は今までの周りの顔色を窺う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arcourt's eyes, which had been watching others' expressions,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱気な色は消え去っていた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like trying to gauge his expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがランスを上目遣いで見上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil looked up at Rance with an upward glance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りや落胆の色はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was no sign of anger or disappointment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なーんもかんも、なくなっちまったな」
「一時は世界の王にまでなったというのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though I was once the king of the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 随分スッキリしたもんだ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
